name: Mad Monkey: Best Arcade Kid Game (Kids Games+ Retro Arcade = Fun)
name_original: Mad Monkey: Best Arcade Kid Game (Kids Games+ Retro Arcade = Fun)
description:
Mad Monkey, Mad Mad Monkey!

Visit us on twitter @MadMonkeyApp

Don't let that cute smile fool you! Mad Monkey steals all of your precious items, and then tosses them down at you trying to ruin your day! Chase him in the forest, the circus, a science lab (after an experiment gone wrong) and then face him as a ninja monkey! Catch everything he throws down at you in each level, and watch him get mad. He then throws faster and moves faster trying to splat everything!

You can now poke the monkey and annoy him some when he makes you mad!

Be on the look out for the hidden monkey, he only pops out for a second and you have to tap him to unlock a secret bonus level that will boost your score much higher.

Fun, addictive, arcade style gameplay.
Easy to pick up and play.
Ninja Monkeys. (Definitely worth buying for this one feature alone!)
Precise touch control.
Great music and sound effects.
Retina Display support (Icon and Game Graphics)
Universal App (pay once and get it for iPhone,iPod, and iPad)

More levels, hidden secrets, and crazy monkeys are all coming soon!

Intro Mad Monkey voice over by David Bottoms.

============
Want more info and a video? Head here:
http://www.skhapps.com/mad-monkey

If you have any cool suggestions or things you would like to add to the game please email us at:

madmonkeyideas@skhapps.com
============

Scores needed to get 5 stars
Forest: 700
Circus: 800
Lab: 900
Ninjas: 1000
